title: Афродеревня
overview: A comedy series about what happens when a group of Africans unexpectedly arrives in a remote Russian village, and on the initiative of a local girl who has returned from Africa. The village head, Anatoly Stolbov, who is used to spending budgets and avoiding change, finds himself in a difficult situation: in order to retain power, he will have to help the Africans integrate. But his plan falls apart when he learns that his daughter is going to marry one of them.
